migrate.start: '{module}' module is checking the world's data, please do not close or refresh the tab/browser.
migrate.end: '{module}' module is now done with the data checking.

confirm.title: Default Table Confirm?
confirm.content: A default table already exists in this world, would you like to override it or create a new one ?

removeActions.title: Remove Hero Actions from Characters
removeActions.removed: Hero Actions were removed on selected Character(s).

cards.use.flavor: Spends a Hero Point to use

table.name: Hero Actions Deck (do not delete)
table.description: Table for Hero Actions used in consort with the Hero Points.
table.noFormula: The Hero Deck table has no formula, tell your GM he messed up.
table.drawError: An error occurred during the draw, most likely the table contains non-conform results.

tableUUID.name: Table UUID
tableUUID.hint: Unique ID of the Deck Table. To get the UUID of a table (in a compendium or in the Rollable Tables directory), simply open the table and Right-Click on ðŸ“” next to its name. If left empty, the first Hero Deck table found in your world will be used, if none, then the default compendium table will be used instead.

use.noPoints: You need at least 1 Hero Point to use a Hero Action.
use.noDetails: Could not find the details for this Hero Action.
